tool_description: Detects unusual patterns and anomalies in engine sensor data using statistical analysis and machine learning techniques.

current_readings.description: Current sensor reading values for anomaly detection

historical_data.description: Historical sensor data for baseline comparison (minimum 100 points)

sensor_labels.description: Labels identifying each sensor in the data arrays

detection_method.description: Anomaly detection algorithm: statistical, isolation_forest, or hybrid

sensitivity.description: Detection sensitivity (0.1 to 1.0, higher = more sensitive)

window_size.description: Rolling window size for analysis (10 to 1000)

exclude_transients.description: Whether to exclude transient spikes during acceleration/deceleration

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: historical_data must contain at least 100 data points for reliable anomaly detection.
Array length mismatch: current_readings, historical_data sections, and sensor_labels must have consistent dimensions.
Invalid detection method: Use 'statistical', 'isolation_forest', or 'hybrid' for detection_method.
Invalid sensitivity: sensitivity must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid window size: window_size must be between 10 and 1000.
Data quality issue: Historical data contains too many missing values or outliers for reliable baseline establishment.
usage: Provide current_readings, historical_data, and sensor_labels. Optionally configure detection_method, sensitivity, window_size, and exclude_transients based on monitoring requirements.

anomaly_scores.description: Anomaly score for each sensor (0-1, higher indicates more anomalous)

anomalous_sensors.description: List of sensor IDs that show anomalous behavior

confidence_levels.description: Confidence level for each anomaly detection (0-1)

detection_summary.description: Summary of anomaly detection results and recommendations
